comment: "Ye rahulya dil pe nahi lene ka..." Hamesha yaad rahega Bhai 😂. Is bande ko Bina smile ke kabhi dekha hi nhi. Mahool Bane baad "Navrai mazhi ladachi ladachi g" was next level. Bas Aise hi khush raha kar Bhai...
name: Rahul Raut

comment: Prthya bro, bhai tu jahan hota hai, wahan ka mood light kar deta hai, kitne bhi tesion ho, kuch rahna nahi bhoolta, kya hi character hai bro, always remeber your line "kya hi hai isme", kitna bhi bada task ho, 😂. Bhoolna mat bro, hope ki aage bhi milna hoga, ATB for future endeavors.
name: Rishi Parsai

comment: Bro hamesha hasta rhta h par assignment, exam ya project evaluation aate hi bahut serious ho jaata h😂. Khana khane se phle nahata jaroor h😅.Hamara ML expert always. Cricket me iski fielding is OMG. Will meet in bangalore and fir khelenge. Best of Luck yaar for future❤️.
name: Dishesh Singh Chaudhary

comment: Most disciplined roommate, roj kaise naha leta ha yaar😅. Like your style of dealing problems 'Are dekh lenge'. And the smile afterwards. Will call you 'ML Expert' always😂. All the best bhai❤.
name: Harshit Pachar

comment: Bhai, bade hi calm insaan ho aur tumhari muskurahat toh kuch aur hi kisse bayan karti hai. 😊 You were great as a team member during BTP. Bas ek sikwa hai tumse, kisi ki birthday party par tumne lavani karke nahi dikhaya.😄 Keep growing bro. 😊🌟
name: Mayank Tayal

comment: Patil Bhau🔥. Made so many projects with you, it was always fun. Most calm person I know❤️. Keep grinding keep winning 💪.
name: Devesh Jindal

comment: Ayee parthya. Bhai sabse pehle hasna shuru kr deta hai (ifkyk). ML Expert. Baki rahulya pareshan kre toh bolna meko, saath me pit denge use😂. All the best bro. (Bangalore aur nashik dono jagah milte hi rahenge apan toh🙃)
name: Pranav

comment: Na catch leta hai aur na he tension leta hai. Koi hamesha khush rahana tujhse sikhe, bindas insaan hai bhai tu.. Kay Parthaya , aur bhau will remain constant.
name: Harsh Wardhan Dohaiya

comment: Prathya, the Marathi marvel! Always switching to Marathi mode, making me call out for that 'bro caption.' 🤣 Your cricket skills are top-notch, mate! Here's to more laughs and victories ahead! 🏏👊🎉
name: Saurabh Kumar Singh

comment: "Aur prthya"🔥🔥. No matter the situation, your laugh always lightens up everyone's mood. Bhai ko koi GAN model banane ko bolde bas😂. Bas aise hi rehna bhai. Keep working keep smiling. ATB for the future.
name: Rishabh Sharma

comment: From sharing in my joys to comforting me in my sorrows, you've been my constant companion through every twist and turn of life's journey.I will miss having you by my side every day, Thanks for having me In your Life Bhaiya ❤️
name: Devarapalli Nissi

comment: The guy with zero haters having a very pleasant smile on his face everytime. Make sure that smile never leaves you bro. Thanks for teaching the perfect form in Gym. Best of luck for your future endeavours and stay in touch bhai 🙌
name: Ashish Agrawal
